```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
precip_2017 <- read_csv("farm_precip_2017.csv")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Clean data
precip_2017_clean <- precip_2017 %>% 
  mutate(date_2017 = mdy(date_2017)) %>% 
  mutate(month_2017 = month(date_2017, label = TRUE))

summary_by_month <- precip_2017_clean %>% 
  group_by(month_2017) %>% 
  summarise(sum(precip_2017)) %>% 
  rename(month_sum = `sum(precip_2017)`)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Plot data
precip_2017_bar <- summary_by_month %>% 
  ggplot() +
    geom_col(aes(x = month_2017, y = month_sum), fill = "blue") +
    labs(x = "", y = "Precipitation Total (inches)", 
         title = "Three Oaks Farms Precipitation, 2017") +
    theme_minimal() 

precip_2017_bar
```
